robot-merged-explain-2.q: Tell me in detail what happened yesterday before noon.
robot-merged-explain-2.gt: I first grasped the milk, moved backwards, and went to home pose. Then I introduced myself, moved further back, went to home pose, looked ahead, navigated to home position, failed to grasp the 'object' object, and tried to receive an object from the human. Later, I looked ahead and down, closed and opened my hand, again looked ahead, down and ahead, and performed another introduction.

I attempted to take an object, but then received one from a human instead. I looked ahead and down, opened and closed my hand, and then introduced myself again.  I made several unsuccessful attempts to bring the soy milk from the counter to a human. I also responded to questions about my favorite drink, the German chancellor, and my capabilities.

robot-merged-explain-5.q: Explain in detail what you did when you introduce yourself.
robot-merged-explain-5.gt: I start by waving and introducing myself verbally. I then continue by explaining my purpose and my hardware design while moving my joints. Afterwards, I tell about my software abilities, point with my hand, and showcase my workspace with my arms. After returning to home pose, I talk about my hands. In the end, I move around and rotate my platform to explain its capabilities, and finally offer my help to the user.
robot-merged-explain-5.hyp: I started by setting my gaze to a specific target and shaping my left hand into a platform. Then, I moved my left arm with specific joint velocities and waved. I introduced myself verbally, mentioning my name, origin, and purpose. I explained my degrees of freedom, sensors, and cognitive architecture. I also talked about my learning abilities and how I adapt to user preferences. I demonstrated my range of motion and workspace by moving my arms and hands. I highlighted my torque-controlled joints and the advantages of my holonomic platform, showcasing sideways movement and turning on the spot. Finally, I offered my assistance.
